title: 92/519/EEC: Commission Decision of 3 November 1992 amending the Seventh Council Decision 85/356/EEC of the equivalence of seed produced in third countries
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 3 November 1992
amending the Seventh Council Decision 85/356/EEC of the equivalence  of seed produced in third countries
(92/519/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 November 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of  the Commission
